name: Archio
description:
There is no description, 7 levels

CONTROLS

1: click and drag LMB to move the blocks

2: click on and drag RMB to rotate blocks

CHANGELOG

v0.1

1: Fixed "forever floating" composite blocks

2: Fixed initial velocity on spawned bug

3: Added 3 new models

v0.2

4: Guide Added

5: Start Menu Added

6: Better Optimized for large objects

v0.3

7: Non-Cubes are conformed to better

8: General optimization

9: Meshes are combined for High complexity objects (Performance up)

10: All levels now have randomized requirements from level 1
